channel.title: thePennilessScholar on the-Penniless-Scholar
channel.description: Recent content in thePennilessScholar on the-Penniless-Scholar

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
For a quick cheatsheet, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: About Me
item.description: The Penniless Scholar This one’s about me! The author of this blog!! Here’s a little about my life so far. Birth Stuff In Between Stuff In Between Stuff In Between Death You can view some of my projects here: GitHub.

item.title: Modules
item.description: Modules?! You can learn a little about my current interests that I haven’t fully developed into ideas yet. I call them Modules because I’m a sad sad recent graduate who misses university.
